info.name: Tumblr Christmas Logo (Transparent/Fixed Alpha)
info.description:
A quick edit of the Tumblr Christmas. style by klasdfgh, making the logo transparent for use on light themes. Perfect for acknowledging the holidays without getting too over the top or going through the hassle of changing your theme entirely!

Before and after screenshots display the old logo on a light background, and the new logo on a light background.
info.additionalInfo:
Credit to klasdfgh for the original edit, and to tumblr for making the logo I re-edited in.

EDIT: Fixed positioning and made clickable again.
